languages.text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} Галена Гапрака мертвым — прямо здесь, во дворце. При нем была эта записка".

traits.locale_text: "Я обнаружил Галена Гапрака мертвым — прямо здесь, во дворце. В очень укромном месте и позе молитвы. При нем была эта записка".

languages.text: "I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
languages.original_text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} Галена Гапрака мертвым — прямо здесь, во дворце. При нем была эта записка".

traits.locale_text: "I have discovered a dead body of Halen Gaprak — right here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
"I have discovered a dead body of Halen Gaprak — right here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
"I have discovered a dead body of Halen Gaprak right here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
"I have discovered a dead body of Halen Gaprak right here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
"I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"
"I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

languages.text: 「ヘイレン・ギャプラックの死体をこの宮殿で見つけた。こんなメモを持っていたのだが、何か知らないか？」
languages.original_text: "I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヘイレン・ギャプラックの死体をこの宮殿で見つけた。こんなメモを持っていたのだが、何か知らないか？」

languages.text: “我在这座宫殿里发现了哈伦·贾帕克的尸体，他的身上藏着这张纸条。你对此有什么看法？”
languages.original_text: "I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: “我在宫殿里发现了哈伦·贾帕克的尸体，他的身上藏着这张纸条。你对此有什么看法？”

languages.text: « J'ai découvert le cadavre d'Halen Gaprak dans l'enceinte du palais. Nous avons trouvé ce papier sur lui. Savez-vous quoi que ce soit à ce sujet ? »
languages.original_text: "I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai découvert le cadavre d'Halen Gaprak dans l'enceinte du palais. Nous avons trouvé ce papier sur lui. Savez-vous quoi que ce soit à ce sujet ? »

languages.text: «He encontrado el cadáver de Halen Gaprak aquí, en el palacio. Tenía esta nota. ¿Sabe algo al respecto?».
languages.original_text: "I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: «He encontrado el cadáver de Halen Gaprak aquí en el palacio. Tenía esta nota. ¿Sabe algo al respecto?».

languages.text: "Ich habe hier in diesem Palast die Leiche von Halen Gaprak entdeckt. Er hatte diese Notiz bei sich. Wisst Ihr etwas darüber?"
languages.original_text: "I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe hier in diesem Palast die Leiche von Halen Gaprak entdeckt. Er hatte diese Notiz bei sich. Wisst Ihr etwas darüber?"

languages.text: "Halen Gaprak'ın cesedini burada, sarayımda buldum. Üstünden bu kâğıt çıktı. Bir bilgin var mı?"
languages.original_text: "I discovered the body of Halen Gaprak here, in this palace. He had this note on him. Do you know anything about it?"

traits.locale_text: "Halen Gaprak'ın cesedini burada, sarayımda buldum. Üstünden bu kâğıt çıktı. Bir bilgin var mı?"
